query: SELECT e/ehr_id/value AS EHRID, e/ehr_status/subject/external_ref/id/value AS SubjectID FROM EHR e CONTAINS VERSION v CONTAINS COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.report.v1] CONTAINS EVALUATION x[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1] WHERE c/name/value='Diagnose' AND v/commit_audit/time_committed/value <= '{{last_run_time}}' ORDER BY v/commit_audit/time_committed/value DESC OFFSET 0 LIMIT 5
